title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 29 May 2015 - XWiki
content:

09:56 <vmassol> good morning  
09:56 <cjd> good morning vm  
09:56 <vmassol> guys, we have a release on Monday but jenkins has a lot of failures  
09:56 <vmassol> we need to fix them today so that we're ready for Monday  
09:56 <vmassol> hi cjd  
09:57 <vmassol> tmortagne: you're the RM Monday BTW :)  
11:17 <tmortagne> guys could you move jira issue that won't be done in 7.1RC1, there is still a lot of those  
11:31 <Pbas> Hello, I successful upgraded my xwiki 6.4 to 7.0.1 on my local dev server but ... exploit team on data center didn't manage to do the same: DW didn't detect old xwiki UI extension and propose only to report install. :-( Have you an idea to debug this problem? If we report install we can use xwiki and attach some file on a page. Thxs (here the naughty screen: http://snag.gy/VdWRA.jpg )  
11:33 <gsmeria> has quit

14:48 <tmortagne> Denis2: there is a lot of issues assigned to you for 7.1RC1, are they really planned for 7.1RC1 ?  
14:48 <tmortagne> if not could you move them  
14:49 <Denis2> is now known as <Denis>  
14:49 <Denis> they are, I am committing in a few minutes  
14:51 <Denis> I will have further some further adjustment later today as well, but the big part will be in very soon  
14:53 <tmortagne> will it be ready for Monday ?  
14:54 <Denis> yes it should. I apologize for being late, but I had been very busy this week with other matter, most of this was done earlier, but I have not had time to be at it  
14:55 <Denis> I am committing now the large part, to see if it break existing code, so I can fix it later today  
14:55 <tmortagne> ok
